column2: Privacy Policy Statement     Revised May 29, 2015    Thank you for choosing Allstate. We value you, respect your privacy and work hard to protect your personal information.

Changes to the Online Privacy Policy    We may modify our privacy policy from time to time. Please take a look at the revised date at the top of this page to see when this Privacy Policy was last revised. Each of our customers receives a copy of our privacy policy annually.

Changes to the Online Privacy Policy    We may modify our privacy policy from time to time. Please take a look at the revised date at the top of this page to see when this Privacy Policy was last revised. Each of our customers receives a copy of our privacy policy annually.

We hope you have found this Important Notice helpful. If you are not comfortable with any of the terms or policies described in this Privacy Statement, we ask that you discontinue use of our site. Please be aware that we may periodically update or revise this Privacy Statement. If we make a material change to our online Privacy Statement, we will post a notice on our homepage notifying users that the policy has been revised.
